description: A ping sent after a Fennec->Fenix migration was completed.
name: migration

metrics.name: app_build
metrics.description:
The build identifier generated by the CI system (e.g. "1234/A").
For language bindings that provide automatic detection for this value,
(e.g. Android/Kotlin), in the unlikely event that the build identifier
can not be retrieved from the OS, it is set to "inaccessible". For other
language bindings, if the value was not provided through configuration,
this metric gets set to `Unknown`.

metrics.name: app_channel
metrics.description: The channel the application is being distributed on.

metrics.name: app_display_version
metrics.description:
The user visible version string (e.g. "1.0.3").

In the unlikely event that the display version can not be retrieved,
it is set to "inaccessible".

metrics.name: architecture
metrics.description: The architecture of the device, (e.g. "arm", "x86").

metrics.name: client_id
metrics.description: A UUID uniquely identifying the client.

metrics.name: device_manufacturer
metrics.description:
The manufacturer of the device the application is running on.
Not set if the device manufacturer can't be determined (e.g. on Desktop).

metrics.name: device_model
metrics.description:
The model of the device the application is running on.
On Android, this is Build.MODEL, the user-visible marketing name,
like "Pixel 2 XL".
Not set if the device model can't be determined (e.g. on Desktop).

metrics.name: first_run_date
metrics.description: The date of the first run of the application.

metrics.name: glean.error.invalid_label
metrics.description:
Counts the number of times a metric was set with an invalid label.
The labels are the `category.name` identifier of the metric.

metrics.name: glean.error.invalid_overflow
metrics.description:
Counts the number of times a metric was set a value that overflowed.
The labels are the `category.name` identifier of the metric.

metrics.name: glean.error.invalid_state
metrics.description:
Counts the number of times a timing metric was used incorrectly.
The labels are the `category.name` identifier of the metric.

metrics.name: glean.error.invalid_value
metrics.description:
Counts the number of times a metric was set to an invalid value.
The labels are the `category.name` identifier of the metric.

metrics.name: locale
metrics.description:
The locale of the application during initialization (e.g. "es-ES").
If the locale can't be determined on the system, the value is
["und"](https://unicode.org/reports/tr35/#Unknown_or_Invalid_Identifiers),
to indicate "undetermined".

metrics.name: os
metrics.description:
The name of the operating system.
Possible values:
Android, iOS, Linux, Darwin, Windows,
FreeBSD, NetBSD, OpenBSD, Solaris, unknown

metrics.name: os_version
metrics.description:
The user-visible version of the operating system (e.g. "1.2.3"). If the
version detection fails, this metric gets set to `Unknown`.

metrics.name: android_sdk_version
metrics.description:
The optional Android specific SDK version of the software running on this
hardware device.

metrics.name: migration.addons.any_failures
metrics.description: Did this migration encounter any failures (exceptions)?

metrics.name: migration.addons.failed_addons
metrics.description: How many addons failed to migrate?

metrics.name: migration.addons.failure_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration failed. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.addons.migrated_addons
metrics.description: How many addons were migrated?

metrics.name: migration.addons.success_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration succeeded. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.addons.total_duration
metrics.description: Total duration of this migration.

metrics.name: migration.bookmarks.any_failures
metrics.description: Did this migration encounter any failures (exceptions)?

metrics.name: migration.bookmarks.detected
metrics.description: Total number of detected bookmarks prior to a migration.

metrics.name: migration.bookmarks.duration
metrics.description: Duration of the bookmarks migration (Rust operations).

metrics.name: migration.bookmarks.failure_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration failed. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.bookmarks.migrated
metrics.description: Counters describing how bookmark migration went; should add-up to 'migration.bookmarks.detected'.

metrics.name: migration.bookmarks.success_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration succeeded. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.bookmarks.total_duration
metrics.description: Total duration of this migration.

metrics.name: migration.fxa.any_failures
metrics.description: Did this migration encounter any failures (exceptions)?

metrics.name: migration.fxa.bad_auth_state
metrics.description: If we couldn't migrate due to a bad auth state, what was it?

metrics.name: migration.fxa.failure_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration failed. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.fxa.failure_reason_rust
metrics.description: Why this migration failed (rust exception).

metrics.name: migration.fxa.has_custom_idp_server
metrics.description: Is custom idp server configured?

metrics.name: migration.fxa.has_custom_token_server
metrics.description: Is custom token server configured?

metrics.name: migration.fxa.success_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration succeeded. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.fxa.total_duration
metrics.description: Total duration of this migration.

metrics.name: migration.fxa.unsupported_account_version
metrics.description: What is the detected unsupported account version?

metrics.name: migration.fxa.unsupported_pickle_version
metrics.description: What is the detected unsupported pickle version?

metrics.name: migration.fxa.unsupported_state_version
metrics.description: What is the detected unsupported state version?

metrics.name: migration.gecko.any_failures
metrics.description: Did this migration encounter any failures (exceptions)?

metrics.name: migration.gecko.failure_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration failed. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.gecko.success_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration succeeded. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.gecko.total_duration
metrics.description: Total duration of this migration.

metrics.name: migration.history.any_failures
metrics.description: Did this migration encounter any failures (exceptions)?

metrics.name: migration.history.detected
metrics.description: Total number of detected history items prior to a migration.

metrics.name: migration.history.duration
metrics.description: Duration of the history migration (Rust operations).

metrics.name: migration.history.failure_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration failed. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.history.migrated
metrics.description: Counters describing how history migration went; should add-up to 'migration.history.detected'.

metrics.name: migration.history.success_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration succeeded. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.history.total_duration
metrics.description: Total duration of this migration.

metrics.name: migration.logins.any_failures
metrics.description: Did this migration encounter any failures (exceptions)?

metrics.name: migration.logins.detected
metrics.description: How many logins were detected?

metrics.name: migration.logins.failure_counts
metrics.description: How many logins failed to be migrated, and in which ways?

metrics.name: migration.logins.failure_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration failed. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.logins.success_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration succeeded. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.logins.total_duration
metrics.description: Total duration of this migration.

metrics.name: migration.logins.unsupported_db_version
metrics.description: If we couldn't migrate due to an unsupported db version, what was it?

metrics.name: migration.migration_versions
metrics.description: Versions of the migrations which were executed.

metrics.name: migration.open_tabs.any_failures
metrics.description: Did this migration encounter any failures (exceptions)?

metrics.name: migration.open_tabs.detected
metrics.description: Number of detected open tabs.

metrics.name: migration.open_tabs.failure_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration failed. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.open_tabs.migrated
metrics.description: Number of migrated open tabs.

metrics.name: migration.open_tabs.success_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration succeeded. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.open_tabs.total_duration
metrics.description: Total duration of this migration.

metrics.name: migration.pinned_sites.any_failures
metrics.description: Did this migration encounter any failures (exceptions)?

metrics.name: migration.pinned_sites.detected_pinned_sites
metrics.description: How many pinned sites were detected?

metrics.name: migration.pinned_sites.failure_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration failed. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.pinned_sites.migrated_pinned_sites
metrics.description: How many pinned sites were migrated?

metrics.name: migration.pinned_sites.success_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration succeeded. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.pinned_sites.total_duration
metrics.description: Total duration of this migration.

metrics.name: migration.search.any_failures
metrics.description: Did this migration encounter any failures (exceptions)?

metrics.name: migration.search.failure_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration failed. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.search.success_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration succeeded. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.search.total_duration
metrics.description: Total duration of this migration.

metrics.name: migration.settings.any_failures
metrics.description: Did this migration encounter any failures (exceptions)?

metrics.name: migration.settings.failure_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration failed. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.settings.success_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration succeeded. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.settings.telemetry_enabled
metrics.description: Is telemetry enabled after this migration?

metrics.name: migration.settings.total_duration
metrics.description: Total duration of this migration.

metrics.name: migration.telemetry_identifiers.any_failures
metrics.description: Did this migration encounter any failures (exceptions)?

metrics.name: migration.telemetry_identifiers.failure_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration failed. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.telemetry_identifiers.fennec_client_id
metrics.description: Records clientID of the migrated Fennec profile.

metrics.name: migration.telemetry_identifiers.fennec_profile_creation_date
metrics.description: Records when the migrated Fennec profile was created.

metrics.name: migration.telemetry_identifiers.success_reason
metrics.description: Why this migration succeeded. See codes in TelemetryHelpers.kt

metrics.name: migration.telemetry_identifiers.total_duration
metrics.description: Total duration of this migration.
